--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "xochitla2006" <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
>
>=
 Kup:
> 
> "That is a our goal"said Kup"But we have to reforce this place a=
nd 
> defeat Unicron too"He sighed"What's next?"

Lord Elder approached and=
 leaned on a stone outcropping near the ark,
"We have to protect the ark at=
 all costs." He looks around for a
moment, "It is our past and our future, =
and the minions are becoming
more restless."

Legacy crossed his arms over =
his massive chest as his single optic
pulsed, "THE LONGER ANY OF US STAY ON=
 THIS PLANET IN DEFENSE OF THIS
STRUCTURE, THE MORE PROBABLE IT IS THAT EVE=
N THROUGH INADVERTENT
DESIGN WE WILL CAUSE THE VERY DESTRUCTION WE ARE ATTE=
MPTING TO FORESTALL."

Legacy turned to look at the destruction that litter=
ed the landscape
as if to accentuate his point. 

He turned to look back at=
 Kup, and then at Lord Elder, "IF YOU INTEND
TO DEFEAT UNICRON I WOULD STRO=
NGLY RECOMMEND A CONSOLIDATION OF FORCES
AND TO QUICKLY ACCOMPLISH THIS TAS=
K. IF NOT IT MAY BE IMPOSSIBLE TO
HALT THE INEVITABLE."

Lord Elder nodded =
in acknowledgement although not nessasarilly in
agreement, "Kup meet Legacy=
, resident Temporal guardian." Elder
shrugged, "I would introduce Legacy to=
 you also Kup, but I am sure he
has a complete file on you, like he has on =
many of us."

(TAG: Kup)

Preston
